<[SOFM]>

<[SOFM]>

<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>

<[EOFM]>

<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>
این عین که عین جملهٔ اعیانست
<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>
عینی است که آن حقیقت انسانست
<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>
در آینهٔ دیده ما بتوان دید
<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>
بر شاهد اگر ز روی معنی نگری
<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>

<[EOFM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>

<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>

<[SOT]>

<[SOSM]>

<[SOFM]>
